headline: A Look At Motorola Solutions (MSI) Valuation After FIFA World Cup 2026 Razr Partnership Launch
summary: Motorola Solutions (MSI) has drawn fresh attention after Motorola unveiled the motorola razr FIFA World Cup 26 Edition, tying its foldable smartphone line directly to the upcoming global tournament and announcing an exclusive early launch with Verizon. See our latest analysis for Motorola Solutions. These World Cup themed launches and the recent ESOP related shelf registration filing come after a mixed stretch for Motorola Solutions.
